targets.query: SELECT last("startedT") FROM "jmeter" WHERE "application" =~ /$app$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($granularity) fill(null)
SELECT sum("hit")  / 30 FROM "$retention"."jmeter" WHERE "application" = '$app' AND "transaction" = 'all' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s)
SELECT sum("countError")  / sum("count") FROM "$retention"."jmeter" WHERE "application" =~ /$app$/ AND "transaction" = 'all' AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("hit")  / 5 FROM "jmeter" WHERE "application" =~ /$app$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($granularity) fill(null)
SELECT mean("countError")  / 5 FROM "jmeter" WHERE "application" =~ /$app$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($granularity) fill(0)
SELECT mean("avg") FROM "jmeter" WHERE "application" =~ /$app$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($granularity), "transaction"
SELECT mean("count")  / 5 FROM "jmeter" WHERE "application" =~ /$app$/ AND "transaction" <> 'all' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($granularity), "transaction"
SELECT last("count")  / 30 FROM "$retention"."jmeter" WHERE "application" =~ /$app$/ AND "statut" = 'ko' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s), "transaction" fill(null)
SELECT sum("count")  / 5 FROM "jmeter" WHERE "application" =~ /$app$/ AND "statut" = 'ko' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($granularity), "responseCode" fill(null)

targets.expr: (((sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas{deployment=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_statefulset_replicas{statefulset=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_daemonset_status_desired_number_scheduled{daemonset=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset"}) or vector(0))) - ((sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas_available{deployment=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_statefulset_status_replicas{statefulset=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_daemonset_status_number_ready{daemonset=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset"}) or vector(0)))) / ((sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas{deployment=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_statefulset_replicas{statefulset=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_daemonset_status_desired_number_scheduled{daemonset=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset"}) or vector(0))) * 100

(sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas_available{deployment=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_statefulset_status_replicas{statefulset=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_daemonset_status_number_ready{daemonset=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset"}) or vector(0))

(sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas{deployment=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_statefulset_replicas{statefulset=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_daemonset_status_desired_number_scheduled{daemonset=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset"}) or vector(0))

list.name: app
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "process" WITH KEY = "application"
list.tagsQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "events" WITH KEY = "tags"

list.name: transaction
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "jmeter" WITH KEY IN ("transaction","application") where application =~ /$app/ and transaction  !~ /all/
